data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gupta, Sunil Kumar, Shi, Jian-Ping, Chandra, Kailash (2016): Hedotettix angulatus sp. nov. (Orthoptera: Tetrigoidea: Tetrigidae, Tetriginae) a new pygmy grasshopper species from India. Zootaxa 4173 (5): 466-475, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4173.5.3|6 occurrences
